hints.title: Hypocoercive LSI for Kinetic Operator (Reference)
hints.content:
66: :label: thm-kinetic-lsi-reference
67: 
68: The kinetic operator $\Psi_{\text{kin}}(\tau)$ with Langevin dynamics satisfies:
69: 
70: $$
71: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu' \| \pi) \leq (1 - \alpha_{\text{kin}} \tau) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu \| \pi) + O(\tau^2)
72: $$
73: 
74: where:
75: $$
76: \alpha_{\text{kin}} = O(\gamma \kappa_{\text{conf}})
77: $$
78: 
79: with $\gamma$ the friction coefficient and $\kappa_{\text{conf}}$ the convexity constant of the confining potential.
80: 
81: **Proof**: See Theorem 3.4 (lines 495-553) and Section 2 (lines 200-494) of [10_kl_convergence.md](10_kl_convergence.md).
